abstract.t: Precision Time Protocol (PTP), as defined in IEEE 1588-2019, lacks cryptographic security mechanisms, exposing deployments to message spoofing, delay attacks, and timestamp manipulation. This document defines an optional Authentication TLV (AUTH_TLV) using modern Authenticated Encryption with Associated Data (AEAD) algorithms to ensure message integrity,authenticity, and replay protection. It also provides example configurations, implementation approaches, and test strategies.
